title: Bug 6410 - File dirtied but not changed by code assist
description: When using code assist, the file is marked as dirtied even though there is no actual change. Additionally, code assist does not appear.
OB: Upon invoking code assist, the file is marked as dirtied, even though no changes have been made. Code assist does not appear as expected.
EB: The file should not be marked as dirtied if no actual changes have been made during code assist. Additionally, when using code assist, the code suggestions should appear as intended.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open a Java file.
2. Place the cursor inside the leftmost parenthesis of a method call.
3. For example, consider 'I' to be the cursor below:
   Object o = anotherObject.method(I);
4. Press Ctrl+Space to invoke code assist.
